subject: Bankruptcies
Baseball
lead_paragraph: M.L.B. objected to a plan proposed by the team to auction its media rights, and asked that a bankruptcy court terminate the exclusive period in which the team can file a reorganization.
snippet: M.L.B. objected to a plan proposed by the team to auction its media rights, and asked that a bankruptcy court terminate the exclusive period in which the team can file a reorganization.
